Sentencas: H2S even at very low concentrations can poison Ni based SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This paper presents the modeling of sulfur poisoning in Ni based anodes at low H2S concentrations (1 ppm - 8 ppm).
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A kinetic model for predicting the fractional coverage of sulfur is developed by considering elementary step chemical reactions.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The rate expression for sulfur coverage is developed by assuming the dissociation of surface adsorbed SH as the rate limiting step.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It is assumed that the three phase boundary length decreases linearly with increase in fractional coverage of sulfur.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The kinetic model is incorporated in to a button cell model to simulate experimentally observed impedance response.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The exchange current density parameters are evaluated by calibrating the model predictions with experimentally observed de polarization data at different temperatures.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The same exchange current density parameters are used for impedance simulations as well.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The impedance spectra is simulated by using a Randles circuit.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The charge transfer resistances required for the Randles circuit are calculated from numerical simulation of button cell.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Excellent agreement is observed between the model predictions and experimental observations.
Titulo: Modeling Sulfur Poisoning of Ni-Based Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
